analysis.description:
TokenDestructible.destroy (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#299-311) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#307-308)

StopIcoDonation.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#429-435) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol)

StopIcoCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#329-330)
StopIcoCoin.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#328-329)
StopIcoCoin.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#330)
StopIcoCoin.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#330-331)
StopIcoDonation.wallet should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol#387)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x3dfaf3a340168a4552ab1937ea9527aae47c5ea1.sol:
